verses.verse: The lot <S%H1486><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%> from the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> at Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> on the east, <S%H4217><s%> even the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> going up <S%H5927><s%> from Jericho <S%H3405><s%> through the hill country <S%H2022><s%> to Bethel. <S%H1008><s%>
It went out <S%H3318><s%> from Bethel <S%H1008><s%> to Luz, <S%H3870><s%> and passed along <S%H5674><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Archites <S%H757><s%> to Ataroth; <S%H5852><s%>

and it went down <S%H3381><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Japhletites, <S%H3311><s%> to the border <S%H1366><s%> of Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> the lower, <S%H8481><s%> even to Gezer; <S%H1507><s%> and ended <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%>
The children <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> and Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> took their inheritance. <S%H5157><s%>

This was the border <S%H1366><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families. <S%H4940><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> of their inheritance <S%H5159><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> was Ataroth Addar, <S%H5853><s%> to Beth Horon <S%H1032><s%> the upper. <S%H5945><s%>

The border <S%H1366><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%> at Michmethath <S%H4366><s%> on the north. <S%H6828><s%> The border <S%H1366><s%> turned about <S%H5437><s%> eastward <S%H4217><s%> to Taanath Shiloh, <S%H8387><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> along it on the east <S%H4217><s%> of Janoah. <S%H3239><s%>

It went down <S%H3381><s%> from Janoah <S%H3239><s%> to Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> to Naarah, <S%H5292><s%> reached <S%H6293><s%> to Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> and went out <S%H3318><s%> at the Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

From Tappuah <S%H8599><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> went along westward <S%H3220><s%> to the brook <S%H5158><s%> of Kanah; <S%H7071><s%> and ended <S%H8444><s%> at the sea. <S%H3220><s%> This is the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the tribe <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> according to their families; <S%H4940><s%>

together with the cities <S%H5892><s%> which were set apart <S%H3995><s%> for the children <S%H1121><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> all the cities <S%H5892><s%> with their villages. <S%H2691><s%>

They didn't <S%H3423><s%> drive out the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in Gezer; <S%H1507><s%> but the Canaanites <S%H3669><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%> to this day, <S%H3117><s%> and have become servants <S%H5647><s%> to do forced labor. <S%H4522><s%>
